Macros
EMIF4F Symbols Defined
EMIF4F

Macros

#define hEmif   ((CSL_Emif4fvRegs*)CSL_DDR3_0_SLV_CFG_REGS)
 
#define EMIF_ECC_PROTECTED_NUM_ADDR_RANGE   (0x2)
 Number of ECC Protected Adrress range in EMIF Module.
 
#define EMIF_ECC_FIFO_BUF_SIZE   (0x4U)
 Internal FIFO Buffer with depth of 4 which can store corrected error address or non correctable error address This fifo can store only first 4 error address.To store the 5th error address. Writing 0x1 will pop one element of the FIFO to error address register ,clearing 0th address in FIFO & then we can store next new error addresss in FIFO else will miss the error address log i.e., Overflow occurs when the num ECC Err is more than EMIF_ECC_FIFO_BUF_SIZE.
 
#define EMIF_ECC_ENABLE   (0x1U)
 Macro to Enable EMIF ECC.
 
#define EMIF_ECC_DISABLE   (0x0U)
 Macro to DISABLE EMIF ECC.
 
#define EMIF_EOI_CLEAR   (0x1U)
 Macro to Clear EMIF End of Interrupt.
 
#define hEmif   ((CSL_Emif4fvRegs*)CSL_DDR3_0_SLV_CFG_REGS)
 
#define EMIF_INTR_STATUS_ALL
 Macro defines mask for all the interrupts to disable for EMIF.
 
#define EMIF_INTR_ALL   (EMIF_INTR_STATUS_ALL)
 Macro defines mask for all the interrupts for EMIF.
 
#define hEmif   ((CSL_Emif4fRegs*)CSL_DDR3_EMIF_CONFIG_REGS)
 
#define hEmif   ((CSL_EmifaRegs*)CSL_EMIFA_0_REGS)
 
#define hEmifb   ((CSL_EmifbRegs*)CSL_EMIFB_0_REGS)
 

Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define hEmif   ((CSL_Emif4fvRegs*)CSL_DDR3_0_SLV_CFG_REGS)

Handle to access EMIF4F registers accessible through config bus.

#define hEmif   ((CSL_Emif4fRegs*)CSL_DDR3_EMIF_CONFIG_REGS)

Handle to access EMIF4F registers accessible through config bus.

#define hEmif   ((CSL_EmifaRegs*)CSL_EMIFA_0_REGS)

Handle to access EMIF4F registers accessible through config bus.

#define hEmif   ((CSL_Emif4fvRegs*)CSL_DDR3_0_SLV_CFG_REGS)

Handle to access EMIF4F registers accessible through config bus.

#define hEmifb   ((CSL_EmifbRegs*)CSL_EMIFB_0_REGS)

Handle to access EMIF4F registers accessible through config bus.
